glamping.title: Glamping
glamping.subtitle: For those who’d like to join us onsite

paragraphs: We have 6 glamping tents that Beaux Belltents will be putting up and decking out with furniture and bedding. They sleep between 2 and 4 people and it is a flat cost of £200 per tent for the whole weekend whether you stay one night or two (take off £25 if you want to bring your own bedding and £5 extra per person if you’d like to upgrade your bed options).
You can see more at Beaux Bell Tents and book directly through them by emailing hello@beauxbelltents.co.uk (make sure to reference Lydia and Alex’s wedding, 06/08/2022 at Kingsettle Stud).

camping.title: Camping
camping.subtitle: For those who’d like to join us onsite

paragraphs: If you are a happy camper yourself already and would just like to bring your own tent set up (or campervan!) then you can book a pitch through Susie at Kingsettle Stud. It’s £15 for a pitch for the weekend.

We will also have one 5 metre communal bell tent set up for everyone camping to use as a social space. If the weather is warm we’ll open up the sides, it it’s chillier we’re getting a wood burning stove (and tent chimney!) so we don’t miss out on the campfire gatherings. If the weather is looking dodgy then we will set the tent up a bit further away so campers aren't disturbed.
There will be a luxury toilet block and use of showers.

For those preferring to stay off site there’s lots of options a bit further afield depending on your taste and budget. Salisbury probably has the most options and is a 20 minute drive away. You can also look at Airbnbs or hotels in surrounding villages. If you’re planning to take advantage of the open bar we would recommend pre-booking a taxi in advance. If you’re interested in sharing a taxi so you can split the cost (and carbon footprint!) then let us know >>here<< and we will add you to all to a group so you can co-ordinate with other guests.
Just to give you an idea for an 11.30pm pick up All the Sevens have quoted £39 for a standard car and £55 for an 8 seater (or £25 and £38 if before 10pm). 01722 777777 or book@allthesevens.co.uk
